sourcesContent:
import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import logo from '../../assets/logo.jpg'; import { useLocation, useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function Channel({ channelId }){ const [userInfo, setUserInfo] = useState([]); const location = useLocation(); const isHomePage = location.pathname === `channel` useEffect(() => { fetch(`http://localhost:8000/api/user_channel_json/${channelId}`, { method: 'GET', credentials: 'include', }) .then(response => { if (response.status === 200) { return response.json(); } else { throw new Error('Failed to fetch user info'); } }) .then(data => { setUserInfo(data); console.log(data); console.log(location.pathname); }) .catch(error => { console.error('Error fetching user info:', error); }); }, []) return ( <>

{userInfo.name}

@{userInfo.slug} {userInfo.subscribers} subscribers {userInfo.videoslength} videos
{userInfo.description}
youtube.com and more
{/*
*/}
) }
